research_question: At R=0.5A (compressed bond), the HF approximation is excellent (g1 dominates, small g4). Does Tuna-9 reproduce this 'easy' regime accurately? This is the simplest point on the PES curve — if hardware fails here, noise is truly fundamental.
description: VQE H2 at R=0.5A (short bond) on qubits [2,4]. Near-HF regime with small correlation. Part of 6-point PES curve to compare with Kandala Fig 2.
